title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: Greetings my fellow Naija people. I don't know why some people are still falling into the traps of those people that will call you for phone or meet you one on one and introduce fake decentralized investment, that if you invest #100,000 you will get #200,000 within a week. Someone came to share with me that there is a BTC investment one of his neighbor introduced to him, that when he invest on it through him , my friend will get double profit from it but the minimum anyone can start with is #500,000 above, that the numbers of people they want in that BTC investment is almost complete, that he came to seek advice from me if such decentralized investment is real. But I told my friend to run alway from them, that those guys are scammers and they don't have any knowledge about BTC investment. Did I give him a good advice ? What is your advice to such person.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: People are greedy. That is what scammers are using to scam the novices.100% investment profit in just a week is definitely a scam. Some are through calls. The scammer can request you of OTP sent to you as sms, which they can use to scam you by taking over your account, like bank account to withdraw yorj money. I have received such calls before and most are OTP scam used to access your bank account. It is possible to use it to access crypto exchange accounts too, but all such calls that I have received before are related to naira scam.There are some that are through text messages too. The one that I noticed which is bitcoin or crypto scam are Whatsapp messages. I do not wait to report such messages which also result to complete blocking of such account for further annoying scam messages. The WhatsApp scam attempt messages from unknown people was common on my WhatsApp last year and beginning if this year. But they have nothing to receive from me because it is easy to spot them as scam.No matter where the scam is coming from and the tactics the scammers are using, they are easy to know and avoid, but some people are ignorant and greedy about scam.Bitcoin is an asset, you can hold it and wait for the price to appreciate and earn from it, instead of depending on people to hold for you which may result to scam. If you find out, the people they depend on for the HYIP investment are unknownn to them and no how to trace them.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on June 21, 2023, 03:38:30 PMDid I give him a good advice ? What is your advice to such person.You actually did a good job O.P by saving your friend from falling victim to such heartless scammers, because that's how they go about using the name Bitcoin to scam innocent newbies, creating a bad image about Bitcoin, as who ever fall victim will start seeing anything bitcoin related as a scam, which is ought not to be that way. However, whoever that will fall victim to such scam must be a greedy person, because greed is the only reason why anyone will fall victim to such this 2023, after everything MMM & Twinkas did to us many years ago, because imagine a person asking you to invest #500,000 to get double in 1week, isn't common sense supposed to tell you that this is likely to be a scam. But some will allow greed blindfold there eyes and later after falling victim, blame their village people for it.So let's not get tired to always be our brothers keeper, and eh for really make sense @ O.P if to say you been fit ask that your friend about the name of that website, so that other newbies here go fit see say they be scam and avoid them.

Funny enough, even well knowledgeable individuals can still fall victim depending on how organised and packaged the scammers make it to be.I personally avoid any scheme that tell me to invest and get a ridiculous ROI in a very short timeframe, I also avoid any scheme that tells me to invest and bring two other people to invest under me.

comments.body: You really did well to have stopped your friends & neighbor from endangering their selves not to invest with such huge amount of money, at this hard time for someone to go waste about $700 to a fake site that won't even yield any meaningful profits to them. What is mostly affecting our people is to become rich overnight without them thinking twice or having to know the sources of the site whether is a fake website or not, all they want is just for them to invest and get their profits in returns of 2 weeks or a months. Come to think of it, which investment platform would give you 100 percent in returned without them stressing for the money, naturally I will like called it big eye or open eyes to have wanting to invest and receive such payback in return. Lemme join @Charles-Tim to say they are greedy to have wanting to invest 500k to receive 100% payback in few days or so.

Or giving your coins to another third party in the name of an investment platform that is 100% scam,  the most annoying part is the spread of fake Ponzi that promises investors up to 300% profits returns within the shortest time some time say 24 hours.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: That is the money doublers platform of Ponzi scheme. This is an old method of scamming and they are bringing bit again. I don't think those who knows about it would fall for it again. I really fall for this guys on WhatsApp in that year. Chaii!!! If you deposit that money in the account, that money is gone, you can't withdraw that cash again, that is when system upgrade and system maintenance everytime. What you told him is the best. Let him run away before he fall for them. Bitcoin investment does not need third party. He can do it by himself, he can meet you and you teach him how to open wallet and buy bitcoin inside and hodle it for like five years. Then he will do well.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Well, I think every reason behind that circles around greed; if not greed, then I really don't see any reason why someone should be told to invest $100k and receive $200k within just a week or two, and the person will just foolishly agree to it without asking questions. First, where should that sum of 100% profit that I would earn within a short period of time come from? The second question is, if you are giving me 100% profit in just a week, then what would be their own profit, or are they really making 200% profit in a week? That kind of big interest is even enough to give you a red flag that it is a scam. There is no aspect of earning money that is so easy to the extent of generating 100% in a week, but people sometimes sell their real sense for greedy interest in situations like that.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: There are instances we discover seing some people making money in cryptocurrency despite we don't know how they come about arriving at such huge success but all we want is to have same opportunity and experience as theirs, things don't work that way sometimes, we need to make findings and know what are the requirements that backed up such outstanding result and begin to work our own towards towards same direction, it may take a little process and a little while for us to get there while the price is being paid and not that we expect everything boom all of a sudden.
